verbose_text: To further reveal the role which BMP-2 plays in LIN induced osteogenesis, MC3T3-E1 cells were pretreated with noggin (100 ng/ml) for 2 h. Pretreatment with noggin significantly reduced the LIN induced gene expression of COL-1, ALP, OCN, BSP and RUNX2 (XREF_FIG).
evidence: expression of COL-1, ALP, OCN, BSP and RUNX2
